metadata.titel_preek: Der Glaube arbeitet an der Angst

kernfrasen: Unser Schiff ist nahe am Kentern
Übergang von einem Stadium... in ein Stadium
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: SOCIETY IS A SHIP ON A PERILOUS JOURNEY

kernfrasen: aus dem Gefängnis einen Versammlungsraum machen
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: PSYCHOLOGICAL STATE IS A BUILT STRUCTURE

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Gott... will uns an diesen Stromkreis der Liebe anschließen

cognitieve_implicaties: God is an impersonal but available energy source
theologische_implicaties: Grace is a continuous flow rather than a discrete act
ethische_implicaties: The believer must remain 'plugged in' to function

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: Replaces traditional 'fountain' imagery with modern industrial 'circuit' imagery to resonate with a technological society.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon successfully blends psychological (Freudian/Jungian) schemas with political-economic ones, but struggles when transitioning from the 'Ship' (external crisis) to the 'Womb' (internal origin of fear).

incoherentie_punten.locatie: Section on Birth/Womb vs. Industrial World
incoherentie_punten.metafoor_a: LIFE IS A RETURN TO THE WOMB (Geborgenheit)
incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The desire for 'darkness and warmth' (Womb) contradicts the call to 'radical critical action' in the factory of the world.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: Transformation/Recycling: The preacher uses the biblical 'Swords to Plowshares' motif to bridge the gap between military destruction and constructive faith.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'Swords to Plowshares' metaphor by applying it to psychological energy (fear as a weapon against oneself).
sterktes.voorbeeld: Auch unsere Angst ist ein Mordinstrument... wir können aus ihr ein produktives Instrument machen.

risicos.beschrijving: Sin is primarily defined as 'separation anxiety' or 'social alienation' rather than a rupture in the relationship with a holy God.
risicos.voorbeeld: Sünde erfahren, ist eine Angst davor, getrennt zu sein durch Schuld.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view God as a therapist rather than Lord.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A sinking ship in a storm (The global economy/industrial nations).

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Explicitly rejects the 'Superstar' or 'God from above' schema in favor of horizontal solidarity.

verstoorde_schemas.schema_naam: The Strong, Unbroken Man (Marlboro Man/Lincoln smoker)
verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Deconstruction of advertising imagery as a 'mask' for suppressed fear.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly fits a 'Political Worship' or 'Peace Movement' context.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the 'TRANSFORMATION OF ENERGY' metaphor. It treats fear not as a substance to be removed, but as a raw material (metal/energy) to be forged or re-routed. This is a highly sophisticated use of CMT that moves away from 'Sin as Filth' (Medical/Purification) toward 'Sin as Misdirected Force' (Industrial/Mechanical).

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the source domain of 'Physical Exile' or 'Social Ostracization'.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: Describe the physical coldness of being outside a locked door.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Use the metaphor of 'The Warmth of a Shared Fire' to bridge energy and personhood.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Implies that faith is a human work/technique.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Clarify that God is the Smith, not just the group.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To counter the 'Factory/Supermarket' world-view with organic life.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to bridge the gap between individual psychology and global politics. The 'Umbau' (reconstruction) of fear is a powerful homiletical move.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Focuses on the cognitive 'work' the ship/factory metaphors do, rather than just their poetic beauty.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Moves beyond 'experience' to the underlying conceptual structures that make experience meaningful.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals how the preacher uses 'Verticality' (Jesus not from above) to shift the power dynamics of the sermon.

appendices.notities: The sermon reflects 1970s/80s West German 'Political Theology' (Sölle-esque style).
